title: Marinated minty lamb kebabs
description: Lamb and mint is a classic combination. Cook on skewers with pepper and onion to add crunch and serve with couscous for a healthy evening meal.This meal is low calorie and provides 421 kcal, 27g protein, 57g carbohydrate (of which 7.5g sugars), 9g fat (of which 3.5g saturates), 1.5g fibre and 0.3g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 green pepper, cored, deseeded and cut into wedges
salt and freshly ground black pepper
